meta.concept: Gaps occur when price opens away from previous close

weekend_gap.description: Gap between Friday close and Sunday/Monday open

trading_strategy.target: Friday close price (full fill) or 50% fill

exceptions.major_news: Gap less likely to fill if news catalyst
exceptions.geopolitical: Safe haven gaps may extend rather than fill
exceptions.trend_gaps: Gap with strong trend less likely to fill quickly

session_gap.description: Gap between session closes (e.g., NY close to Asia open)

news_gap.description: Gap caused by major news event
news_gap.fill_timeframe: Days to weeks if fills at all

trading_strategy.entry: Wait for consolidation, then trade direction
trading_strategy.note: News gaps can run - respect the catalyst

common_gap.description: No special significance, occurs in normal trading
common_gap.characteristics: Small size, no volume spike, no news

breakaway_gap.description: Signals start of new trend, occurs at support/resistance break
breakaway_gap.characteristics: High volume, decisive move, breaks key level
breakaway_gap.trading: Do NOT fade - trade in direction of gap

runaway_gap.description: Occurs mid-trend, shows strong momentum continuation
runaway_gap.characteristics: Gap in direction of trend, high volume
runaway_gap.trading: Do NOT fade - add to trend position
runaway_gap.note: Also called 'measuring gap' - trend halfway done

exhaustion_gap.description: Final gap at end of trend, signals reversal coming
exhaustion_gap.characteristics: Gap after extended move, volume climax
exhaustion_gap.identification: Look for prior extended trend + volume spike

large_15_plus_points.note: Usually news-driven, more risky to fade

monday_gap_fade.setup: Gap 5-15 points with no major news
monday_gap_fade.entry: Monday open or pullback to gap edge

gap_and_go.description: Trade continuation when gap doesn't fill
gap_and_go.setup: Gap opens, initial pullback fails to fill, resumes gap direction
gap_and_go.entry: When price moves away from gap again

partial_fill_exit.description: Take profit at 50-75% fill rather than wait for full fill
partial_fill_exit.rationale: Secures profit, avoids risk of gap extension

gap_as_support_resistance.description: Unfilled gaps act as support/resistance zones
gap_as_support_resistance.setup: Price returns to unfilled gap weeks/months later

gap_identification.full_gap: No overlap between Friday close and Monday open
gap_identification.partial_gap: Some overlap but clear gap visible
gap_identification.gap_fill: Price trades back to Friday close level

best_practices.measure_gap_accurately: Use Friday close to Monday open price
best_practices.check_news: ALWAYS verify no major weekend news
best_practices.wait_for_confirmation: Better to miss first hour and confirm direction
best_practices.time_limit: If no fill by Tuesday, reassess

common_mistakes.chasing_gap_fill: Enter too late after majority filled
common_mistakes.holding_too_long: Gap doesn't fill, turns into loser
common_mistakes.ignoring_gap_type: Treating all gaps same - context matters

island_reversal.description: Gap up, consolidation, gap down - isolated island
island_reversal.trading: Trade in direction of second gap
